parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the cluster.

> This operation contains both the InstanceId and ClusterId parameters. You must specify one of them.

parameters.name: ClusterName
parameters.description: 查询服务下某个集群的实例列表是所需要的参数

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the contact group.

parameters.name: HasIpCount
parameters.description: Specifies whether to query the number of instances that are used for the service.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the instance.

> This operation contains both the InstanceId and ClusterId parameters. You must specify one of them.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries returned per page.

parameters.name: RequestPars
parameters.description: The extended request parameters in the JSON format.
